author.name: Ã†thelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess.

newsMedieval:
In the halls of justice, Russians weigh,
The fate of a scribe who strays from lay,
A hearing held, decisions await,
For Gershkovich, future meets debate.

A lender falls, the Reaper's scythe swings,
Reverse-mortgages' sorrows it brings,
Rising rates claim another's demise,
Bankrupt truths hidden 'neath twisted lies.

But to lands of credit and equity,
Investors gather, hearts light and free,
Odin shines on BlackRock's stoic halls,
As wealth accrues and fortune enthralls.

feedItemsParsed.title: WSJ Reporter Appears in Russian Court for Detention Appeal Hearing
feedItemsParsed.description: The court could uphold pretrial detention, order Evan Gershkovich moved to another jail, allow him house arrest or grant him bail.

feedItemsParsed.title: Rising Rates Brought Down Reverse-Mortgage Lender
feedItemsParsed.description: A government-backed reverse-mortgage program intended to help seniors tap their home equity ran into problems as interest rates rose, pushing one of the largest participating lenders into bankruptcy last fall, recent court documents show.

feedItemsParsed.title: Investors Stay Upbeat on Private Equity, Credit
feedItemsParsed.description: A BlackRock institutional investor survey shows most intend to put more money into the asset classes this year.
